means: Atmospheric Monitoring System for Protection of Health and Environment from Risky Emissions 保护健康和环境不被危险辐射的大气检测系统

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均与"空气"有关。
means: atmosphere ：指围绕有的星球，特别是围绕地球的空气，即大气层。也可指环境气氛。
air ：指空气，也泛指一般气体。
gas ：指气态物，尤指供燃烧取暖或照明的气体，其中一部分称作瓦斯。

word_mean: 空气：围绕地球的整个大气层，包括对流层(troposphere)、对流层顶(tropopause)和同温层(stratosphere)
大气压：压力的单位正好等于101325帕斯卡(pascal)
在海平面上地球大气的压力，约为760毫米汞柱。符号为atm

sentence.Network_en: He sets the atmosphere and shapes the scenes pleasingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把气氛和场面调动得轻松愉快。

sentence.Network_en: At least this second meeting had helped to thaw the atmosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 这第二次会议至少起到了缓和气氛的作用。

sentence.Network_en: There's still an atmosphere of great hostility and tension in the city.
sentence.Network_cn: 强烈的敌对和紧张气氛依然笼罩着这座城市。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from modern Latin atmosphaera, from Greek atmos 'vapour' + sphaira 'ball, globe'

encyclopedia.content: 团队简介 Atmosphere是来自Minneapolis的一队Hip Hop团体，以饶舌乐手Slug为中心。Slug的黑人父亲和白人母亲在他十几岁的时候离婚，少年时期的Slug从涂鸦和街舞开始接触Hip-Hop，并在高中时与两个同学Siddiq Ali (Stress) 和Derek Turner (Spawn)组成了the Rhyme Sayers Collective团体。在早期Slug是作为DJ参加Atmosphere演出的，而Spawn负责说唱。后来这两人结识了制作人Ant，以及与他们志同道合的MC Musab、Mr. Gene Poole和th

entry.def: A planet's atmosphere is the layer of air or other gases around it.

example.ex: ...dangerous levels of pollution in the Earth's atmosphere...
example.tran: 地球大气层污染程度严重

example.ex: The Partial Test-Ban Treaty bans nuclear testing in the atmosphere.
example.tran: 《部分禁止核试验条约》禁止在大气层中进行核试验。

entry.def: The atmosphere of a place is the air that you breathe there.

example.ex: These gases pollute the atmosphere of towns and cities.
example.tran: 这些气体污染了城镇的空气。

entry.def: The atmosphere of a place is the general impression that you get of it.

example.ex: Pale wooden floors and plenty of natural light add to the relaxed atmosphere...
example.tran: 淡色木地板和充足的自然光平添了几分轻松的氛围。

example.ex: There's still an atmosphere of great hostility and tension in the city.
example.tran: 强烈的敌对和紧张气氛依然笼罩着这座城市。

entry.def: If a place or an event has atmosphere, it is interesting.

example.ex: The old harbour is still full of atmosphere and well worth visiting.
example.tran: 这座古老的港口依然充满了情趣，颇值得一游。

means.word_mean: 1. a particular environment or surrounding influence;
2. a unit of pressure: the pressure that will support a column of mercury 760 mm high at sea level and 0 degrees centigrade
3. the mass of air surrounding the Earth;

sentences.sentence: "there was great heat as the comet entered the atmosphere"

means.word_mean: 4. the weather or climate at some place;
5. the envelope of gases surrounding any celestial body
6. a distinctive but intangible quality surrounding a person or thing;

sentences.sentence: "an atmosphere of defeat pervaded the candidate's headquarters"
"the place had an aura of romance"

auth_sentence.content: No one cared though, the atmosphere was fantastic.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one cared though, the atmosphere was fantastic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one cared though, the atmosphere was fantastic.

Sentence.sentence: Trees and flowers have all been planted in the shopping center, making the atmosphere pleasant.
Em, I always serve the freshest possible food and I make the atmosphere as comfortable and as pleasant as I can, so that my customers will want to come back.
billion metric tons of carbon into the atmosphere each year - making forests the leading source of greenhouse gases.
It is estimated that 25% of all methane that released into the atmosphere coming from farm animals.
Half of the methane in the atmosphere is from animals

means.word_mean: 大气, 大气层,大气圈

sentences.en: Changes in the climate are due to pollution of the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 由于对大气层的污染而造成了气候变化。

sentences.en: There were no windows to admit moist atmosphere to enter.
sentences.cn: 没有窗户使潮湿的空气进入室内。

sentences.en: There is an atmosphere of peace and calm in the country quite different from the atmosphere of a big city.
sentences.cn: 在乡间有一种和平宁静的气氛, 与大城市的气氛截然不同。

jushi.english: There were no windows to admit a moist atmosphere.
jushi.chinese: 没有窗户使潮湿的空气进入室内。

jushi.english: Changes in the climate are due to pollution of the atmosphere.
jushi.chinese: 由于对大气层的污染而造成了气候变化。

jushi.english: There is an atmosphere of peace and calm in the country quite different from the atmosphere of a big city.
jushi.chinese: 在乡间有一种和平宁静的气氛,与大城市的气氛截然不同。
